languages.text: Конечности солдата выкручены под неестественными углами. Кто-то переломал ему все кости и бросил умирать.
The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke every bone and left him to die.
languages.original_text: Конечности солдата выкручены под неестественными углами. Кто-то переломал ему все кости и бросил умирать.

traits.locale_text: The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke his every bone and left him to die.
The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke his every bone and left him to die.
The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke his every bone and left him to die.
The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke his every bone and left him to die.
The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke every bone and left him to die.
The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke every bone and left him to die.

languages.text: 这个士兵的四肢以不自然的角度扭曲着。他每根骨头都被打断了，丢在这里自生自灭。
languages.original_text: The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke every bone and left him to die.

traits.locale_text: 这个士兵的四肢以不自然的角度扭曲着。他每根骨头都被打断了，丢在这里自生自灭。

languages.text: 兵士の手足が不自然な角度に曲がっている。誰かが彼の体の骨すべてを折って、放置したのだ。
languages.original_text: The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke every bone and left him to die.

traits.locale_text: 兵士の手足が不自然な角度に曲がっている。誰かが彼の体の骨すべてを折って、放置したのだ。

languages.text: Los miembros del soldado están retorcidos de manera antinatural. Alguien le rompió los huesos y lo dejó morir.
languages.original_text: The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke every bone and left him to die.

traits.locale_text: Los miembros del soldado están retorcidos de manera antinatural. Alguien le rompió los huesos y lo dejó morir.

languages.text: Die Gliedmaßen des Soldaten sind in unnatürlichen Winkeln verdreht. Jemand hat ihm jeden Knochen einzelnen gebrochen und ihn dann sterbend zurückgelassen.
languages.original_text: The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke every bone and left him to die.

traits.locale_text: Die Gliedmaßen des Soldaten sind in unnatürlichen Winkeln verdreht. Jemand hat ihm jeden Knochen einzelnen gebrochen und ihn dann sterbend zurückgelassen.

languages.text: Les membres du soldat gisent dans des positions anormales. Quelqu'un semble avoir pris plaisir à lui briser tous les os avant de l'abandonner sur place.
languages.original_text: The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke every bone and left him to die.

traits.locale_text: Les membres du soldat gisent dans des positions anormales. Quelqu'un semble avoir pris plaisir à lui briser tous les os avant de l'abandonner sur place.

languages.text: Askerin uzuvları bükülmüş ve doğal olmayan şekiller almış. Birileri, her bir kemiğini kırıp onu ölüme terk etmiş.
languages.original_text: The soldier's limbs are twisted at unnatural angles. Someone broke every bone and left him to die.

traits.locale_text: Askerin uzuvları bükülmüş ve doğal olmayan şekiller almış. Birileri her bir kemiği kırmış ve onu ölüme terk etmiş.
